short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It’s a snap adding stuff you like to your Elfster Wishlist from any website using the Wish It! browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add items to your Elfster Wishlist from any store on the web!

Shopping online and spot a cool gift? The Wish It! extension magically grabs the link to add that item to your Elfster Wishlist!

Elfster is the world’s #1 Secret Santa Generator, but our fans love it for every gifting occasion.
Invite your family, friends, co-workers, and community groups to the best way to exchange gifts. 

Elfster is free, fun, and easy. Plus, everyone gets their own Wishlist!

How it Works: Invite Friends - Draw Names - Exchange Gifts - Have Fun!

Be a holiday hero and join 21+ million happy gift givers and party lovers today!
